name: DNA Love
description:
How to play - gamepad require:

  • Left stick - movement
  • Triangle / Y button - kill
  • Circle / B button - hold to grab dead body
  • Right trigger - hold to scan NPCs for organs

Welcome to Evoland city. The year is 2069 (nice).

Our main protagonist is on the verge of mental breakdown because of cyberpsychosis. Player goal is to help the main character to come back to humanity roots and collect human body parts as a replacement for all cyber upgrades.

Be careful, because your action may interest local police men. Run away from the police and get your parts to local Biomard - best human and cyborg parts replacement facility.

Team: TeamHextreme

Members:

  • Adam "Osiek" Osiewła
  • Radek "Wonqu" Zachar
  • Patryk Kmieć
  • Patryk "sDark" Ćwirko
  • Waldemar Krasnodębski
  • Rafał "Roler" Przywara
